docs.snippet: FOCAL EXHIBIT: Without production there obviously would not be much distribution; and without distribution, consumption would be limited. The lesson of interdependence is plain, and this focal exhibit, in the Consumers Building, was designed by...
docs.lead_paragraph: FOCAL EXHIBIT: Without production there obviously would not be much distribution; and without distribution, consumption would be limited. The lesson of interdependence is plain, and this focal exhibit, in the Consumers Building, was designed by Egmont Arens to drive home that lesson.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, April 29.-- President German Busch of Bolivia, a lieutenant colonel in the army, set himself up as a military dictator this week after experimenting a year with a pseudo-constitutional form of government. This is the fourth change in...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, April 29.-- President German Busch of Bolivia, a lieutenant colonel in the army, set himself up as a military dictator this week after experimenting a year with a pseudo-constitutional form of government. This is the fourth change in the Bolivian Government in the four years since the termination of the Chaco war with Paraguay.

headline.main: BOLIVIA'S DICTATOR ABSOLUTE; Busch Abolishes the Laws and Courts and Will Build State on American Oil
